links.*: Finding God in The Lord of the Rings

wikitext.*:
'''Jim Ware''' is the author of various [[Christianity|Christian]] books about fantasy. Often assisted by Kurt Bruner, he produced the "''Finding God...''" series, reporting on religious readings of fantastic literature.

==Bibliography==
* [[2001]]: ''[[Finding God in The Lord of the Rings]]'' (with Kurt Bruner)
* [[2006]]: ''[[Finding God in The Hobbit]]''
